title: gavanamAi iru manamE
sahitya:
gavanamAi iru manamE inik-kaN mUDittanangaLail kaN keTTalaiyAmal


anupallavi

  evan enakku samAnam enragham pEshAdE ingitam arindu nI ellAriDamum enrum


caraNam    aDangi naDappaduvE aTTa lakSaNamAghum accANi illAt-tEr muccANum pOghumO
koDukkai nasukkAda koLLittEL uravAmO kOpa neruppuDanE konjik-kulAvalAmO
